body: Customer Support,\n\nIncident Report: Several outages affecting products and services are disrupting digital marketing activities. body: Offer comprehensive instructions for integrating Malwarebytes with Wix.
answer: To integrate Malwarebytes with Wix, follow these steps: First, connect your Malwarebytes account to your Wix website. Then, navigate to the Wix App Market, search for Malwarebytes, and select 'Add to Site'. You will be redirected to the Malwarebytes website to authenticate and authorize the connection. After completing authentication, you will be redirected back to Wix to finalize the installation. If you encounter any issues during the integration process, please provide specific error messages. We are happy to assist further. Feel free to call at your convenience.
